data.description:
Weezy VR means travel in Virtual Reality.
Go on virtual trips in destinations of your choosing.
Find and explore destinations with simple filters, and pick and choose your favourite hotels, then book them to explore in real life!

Join us on a trip to the top of the Eiffel Tower, ballooning in a Ugandan safari park or lie down and relax on the white beaches of the Dominican Republic - all from the comfort of your own home.

Through our comprehensive booking system, you can try your destinations before you fly. Check out hotels, cities and tourist destinations in VR before you commit to your booking. We can help you find your dream holiday by offering you comprehensive 360 views ahead of time - so there are no bad surprises when you arrive.

Our booking system will be procedurally released over the coming months after a successful test phase on AppLab and SideQuest.

changelog.change_log:
Release 1.3.1
Fixed the video title showing in the wrong place in the download interface
Removed "remove" buttons from destination view
Fixed downloaded videos not playing
Replaced thumbnails with new iterations
Removed the external Paris video
Fixed interfaces overlapping Gem text even when they are geometrically behind them
Fixed scroll interfaces having the wrong dimensions
Fixed some texts not being translated
Fixed translations sometimes not fitting into text boxes
Implemented a UI to provide an overview of purchased videos 
Added a fix for in-app-purchases not always working
Fixed Downloading screen not showing when a download is finished
Fixed all issues with downloads not syncing between interfaces
Fixed filters not working
Fixed thumbnails overlapping the main image in destination view interface
Fixed the logo overlapping text in the Purchase interface
Fixed video overview not updating after purchase
Implemented multi-download support
Fixed purchases not working

1.3.0
External video removed from Palma
Adjusted the advancement popup position in the main scene
Updated all documentation
Fixed interface display issues when enabling accessibility mode through the settings interface
Fixed non-initialised controllers showing in app and initialised controllers not showing in editor
Fixed filters showing the wrong results

Fixed results buttons staying tinted after being selected
Reintroduced travel and virtual travel gems
Fixed ray interactor not showing as active when hovering over gems
Added new Gem visuals

Integrated In-App Purchases
Fixed ray interactors sometimes reaching past interfaces
Reintegrated the Oculus Plugin

Removed the "Virtual Tours" text from the virtual tours destination view interface
Implemented new virtual tours UI
Added highlighting of hovered Gem text
Shortened video descriptions 

Implemented the video download backend
Fixed some language errors
Added language elements to Gems
Added saved pagination on VT filters
Fixed gems not always behaving properly
Adjusted the atmosphere shader
Fixed pagination error in accessibility mode
Fixed Gem text colour not working properly

Added new Hawaii video
Integrated new UI design
Migrated the radio to gems
Updated server for file downloads

Integrated the separate download interface
Fixed some Gem text colour issues
Fixed VT price filters not working
Fixed some video descriptions being too long for the UI
Fixed virtual tour duplicates
Fixed some issues with results buttons
Fixed missing video titles
Fixed the language changing automatically when opening language settings
Fixed buttons/toggles sometimes appearing pressed when they were not selected

Usability changes
4 new Weezy VR videos in Hawaii, Palma and Calais

Fixed bugs with Paris videos
Removed Athens (video format issues)
